revision.revremark: Derived from userID.xml rev.8 - Add tooltip for SoundTraxx Tsunami2 and Econami decoders

variable.label: User ID #1 (0-255)
Id Utente #1 (0-255)
CV Utilisateur #1 (0-255)
Benutzer-CV #1 (0-255)
Uživatel ID #1 (0-255)
Gebruiker-CV #1 (0-255)
variable.tooltip:
Contains the Major firmware version.
e.g. reading a value of 1 in CV 105 and a value of 3 in CV 106
would indicate firmware version 1.3.

variable.label: User ID #2 (0-255)
Id Utente #2 (0-255)
CV Utilisateur #2 (0-255)
Benutzer-CV #2 (0-255)
Uživatel ID #2 (0-255)
Gebruiker-CV #2 (0-255)
variable.tooltip:
Contains the minor firmware version.
e.g. reading a value of 1 in CV 105 and a value of 3 in CV 106
would indicate firmware version 1.3.
